subject: Harness Racing
lead_paragraph: John Campbell, harness racing’s leading driver, will look to extend his record with Rock N Roll Heaven, the 5-2 favorite in the 10-horse field of 3-year-olds for the $1 million race.
snippet: John Campbell, harness racing’s leading driver, will look to extend his record with Rock N Roll Heaven, the 5-2 favorite in the 10-horse field of 3-year-olds for the $1 million race.
